channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Man who died trying to save two people in dangerous sea was ‘true selfless hero’
item.description: Family of Mark Ratcliffe, 67, share tribute to ‘loving husband, father, son’ who died at Withernsea, East Yorkshire, on Friday A 67-year-old man who d...

item.title: Flooding forces hundreds to flee homeless shelter in San Diego
item.description: Officials evacuated about 325 men and women from Bridge shelter on New Year’s Day after heavy rains For the third time in seven years, hundreds of peo...

item.title: Republican casts doubt on Trump’s claim US will ‘run’ Venezuela amid Democrats’ anger over Maduro operation – live
item.description: Senator Tom Cotton says there are ‘still a lot of questions to be answered’ about what happens next in Venezuela and dismisses Trump’s assertion that ...

item.title: Trump’s attack on Venezuela without alerting Congress tests limits of executive power
item.description: Trump’s audacious arrest of Maduro marks a conspicuous break with convention, even as previously observed by the president himself Nothing speaks more...

item.title: Former Little Mix singer Jesy Nelson says her twin babies may never walk
item.description: The 34-year-old posts emotional video saying the girls will ‘fight all the odds’ after spinal muscular atrophy diagnosis The former Little Mix singer ...

item.title: Junk food ads banned to tackle childhood obesity
item.description: The government hopes a ban on junk food adverts will prompt manufacturers to develop healthier recipes.

item.title: Who's in charge of Venezuela and what happens next?
item.description: Donald Trump says the US will "run" Venezuela until a "safe" transition after capturing its president and first lady.

item.title: Starmer ready for closer alignment with the EU 'in the national interest'
item.description: It is the clearest indication yet the PM wants to pursue a closer relationship with Europe in a broader number of areas.

item.title: Man who died trying to save people from sea was selfless hero, family say
item.description: Mark Ratcliffe's family say he was "so cruelly taken trying to save others".

item.title: Jeremy Bowen: Trump's action could set precedent for authoritarian powers across globe
item.description: Trump seems to believe he makes the rules and others cannot have the same privileges.
